sqlite-explorer.description: A powerful SQLite database viewer and editor for VS Code
sqlite-explorer.commands.refresh.title: Refresh Database
sqlite-explorer.config.maxFileSize.markd: Maximum file size in MB that can be opened. Set to 0 for unlimited.
sqlite-explorer.config.defaultPageSize.m: Default number of rows to display per page.
sqlite-explorer.config.maxRows.markdownD: Maximum number of rows to load from a table. Set to 0 for unlimited.
